text: Patrick George Troughton (25 March 1920 â€“ 28 March 1987) was a British actor. He played different sorts of characters and who was in a lot of movies. He is best known as the Second Doctor on Doctor Who from 1966 to 1969. He also appeared in Jason & the Argonauts (1963) and The Omen (1976). His grandson, Harry Melling plays Dudley Dursley in the Harry Potter series of movies.
